column4: ok so I think a cool idea would be to copy windows registry to overwrite wine's registry and view it
cant you just export the regsitry from regedit in windows?
: but I have to log into windows which I don't want to do

if i remember correctly there was some kind of group policy that let you run commands in windows on shutdown, you could dump your registry on each shutdown to a text file and then import it into wine each time (theres prob a command line thing for that too)
